text: Robert Hirsz (born September 17, 1989) is a Polish professional footballer who plays as a forward for Sokół Ostróda. ==Career== Born in Gdańsk, Hirsz began his career at Lechia Gdańsk making his debut on April 15, 2006. He represented the Polish U-19 National Team and was part of the team that finished in 2nd place in the international tournament in Qatar. On 3 February 2019, Hirsz returned to O.K.S. Sokół Ostróda.ROBERT HIRSZ PONOWNIE W SOKOLE OSTRÓDA!, ostrodanews.pl, 3 February 2019 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Sportspeople from Gdańsk Category:Lechia Gdańsk players Category:Tur Turek players Category:Bałtyk Gdynia players Category:Bytovia Bytów players Category:Wigry Suwałki players Category:Wisła Puławy players Category:Olimpia Grudziądz players Category:Association football forwards Category:APEP FC players Category:Cypriot Second Division players Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Cyprus
title: Robert Hirsz
